#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long int
#define s(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define p(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define loop(n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define loop1(n) for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
#define M 10000000007

ll a[15];

ll reversal(ll n)
{
    ll no_of_digits,i,rev,mult,p;
    i=0;
    no_of_digits=0;
    rev=0;
    mult=0;

    while(n)
    {

      a[i]=n%10;
      n/=10;
      i++;

      no_of_digits++;
    }
    i=0;

    while(no_of_digits)
    {
      mult=no_of_digits-1;
      p=pow(10,mult);
      //p(p);
      //p(a[i]);

      rev+=(a[i]*p);
      //p(rev);

      i++;
      no_of_digits--;
    }

  return rev;

}


int main()
{
  ll t,n,sum,c,rev1;
  s(t);

  while(t--)
  {
    s(n);
    sum=n;
    c=0;

    rev1=reversal(n);
    //p(rev1);
    if(sum==rev1)
    printf("0 %lld\n",sum);

    while(1)
    {

      sum+=rev1;
      c++;

      rev1=reversal(sum);

      if(rev1==sum)
      break;

    }

    printf("%lld %lld\n",c,rev1);

  }

  return 0;

}
